products.title: Umbra Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Umbra shadow grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 10.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their umbra light filtering range provides a luxurious finish for your window dressing. Choose between cool and contemporary colour options. This range is ideal for introducing textured detailing, the weave effect finish of the fabric will suit any home interiors.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2264 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Umbra Blackout Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Umbra blackout shadow grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 12.12 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Umbra blackout is a stunning range of light blocking rollers. The fabric offers has a stylish two tone weave effect finish. This roller blind works well inmost spaces due to it's blackout properties.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Midas stripe blackout shadow grey roller blind in white/grey. Made to measure from 20.95 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Their shadow grey striped midas fabric is a mid-dark grey shaded blind. Perfect for making a statement within the home.
